page.title: 09PARISH MAGAZINE: TILMANSTONE
page.content: The{Parish magazine}is a monthly publication produced by volunteers from the parish.{News}and{topics, {diary, letters, small adverts.}and {practical advice,}go to make this mag_ azine. The village{organisations}use it to{publicise}their meetings and special events. The small{subscription}covers the cost of{production}and{stationery. {Covers}are drawn by different people each month. The production team{dist_ {ributes}the magazine in the village. The{Parish Council}uses the magazine to advise of meetings, and the matters raised. This magazine not only provides a{ {news}medium, it is also a link through which the village can come together. Letters and{articles}often generate {debate}and{correspondence}on inter_ national, national and local issues.
